sentences.sContent: I smiled a polite greeting, but the woman hardly acknowledged me.
sentences.sCn: 我客气地笑着打了个招呼，可是那女人没有答理我。

sentences.sContent: The two cousins exchanged greetings (= greeted each other ) .

words.tran: 欢迎，迎接；致敬，致意；映入眼帘

trans.tranCn: 祝贺； 问候； 致谢
trans.tranOther: something you say or do when you meet someone
